text: Candace Cameron Bure has hit back at a body - shaming troll who cruelly commented that it looks like she weighs more than her husband. The 42 - year - old Fuller House star received the mean - spirited jab after she posted an Instagram photo of herself posed at Nobu Malibu with her 18 - year - old son Lev.'All that [ exercising ] and you still look like you weigh more than your husband, did you change your diet?'the commenter asked, apparently mistaking Lev for Candace's husband, retired NHL player Val Bure.
